recipe.title: Roasted Curried Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: 3/4 pound sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces (about 2 cups)
instructions: In a small saucepan melt butter and stir in curry powder and salt and pepper to taste. In a small baking pan toss potatoes with butter mixture and roast in oven, shaking pan occasionally, until golden and tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
